cousin.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the child of your uncle or aunt
cousin.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that has the same origins as something else
cousin.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The Alaskan brown bear is a close cousin of the grizzly bear.
a drug that is a chemical cousin to amphetamines
cousin.translation[0].definitions[2].def: someone or something that is similar to someone or something else
cousin.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: His avant-garde music, sometime cousin to jazz, had limited appeal.
